name: event-parsing-etl-batch
description: Parses individual raw transactions from a BigQuery table and stores them in another BigQuery table.

parameters.name: input_table
parameters.label: BigQuery input table name.
parameters.helpText: Name of the input table to consume from.

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: BigQuery output table name.
parameters.helpText: Name of the BigQuery output table name.
